## üéØ Core Transformation Features
*   **üîß One-Click Script Library:** Apply a wide array of pre-built scripts for common tasks: encode/decode Base64, URL, HTML; format/validate JSON; parse JWT tokens; generate hashes (MD5, SHA); and many more.
*   **üìù Simple Scratchpad Interface:** Paste or type any text snippet into a clean, minimal editor and run scripts directly on the content with immediate, in-place results.
*   **üîÑ Chained Operations & Custom Scripts:** Run multiple transformations in sequence (e.g., decode Base64 then prettify JSON) and add your own custom JavaScript scripts to extend functionality.

---

## About Boop
Boop is a lightweight, dedicated tool for developers, sysadmins, and anyone who frequently works with text-based data that needs quick inspection or transformation. It addresses the common frustration of switching between browser tabs, terminal windows, and online tools to perform simple operations like decoding a JWT, formatting a minified JSON payload, or converting character encodings. By providing a persistent, offline-capable scratchpad coupled with a powerful plugin system, Boop turns these ad-hoc tasks into one-click operations, streamlining debugging, API testing, and data analysis workflows.

The application's power comes from its extensible script system. While it includes a robust default set of scripts covering cryptography, encoding, formatting, and data manipulation, users can easily browse and install additional scripts shared by the community or write their own using JavaScript. This makes Boop adaptable to niche use cases, such as transforming log formats, sanitizing data, or applying custom regex patterns. Its focus on simplicity and speed‚Äîopening instantly and keeping your text between sessions‚Äîmakes it an indispensable utility that lives in your dock or taskbar, ready to "boop" your data into shape at a moment's notice.

---

## ‚ú® Tool Advantages

*   **‚ö° Instant Offline Utility:** Perform transformations without an internet connection or reliance on slow web tools, keeping sensitive data secure on your machine.
*   **üß© Extensible Script Ecosystem:** Continuously grow your toolkit by installing community scripts for new formats, APIs, or custom data processing logic.
*   **üíæ Persistent Workspace:** Your scratchpad content is saved between sessions, allowing you to pick up right where you left off on a long-term debugging task.

---

## ‚öôÔ∏è System Compatibility

**For Development & Data Utility Work:**
*   **Operating System:** Compatible with current versions of mainstream desktop operating systems.
*   **Processor:** Any modern 64-bit processor. Performance requirements are minimal.
*   **Memory (RAM):** 512 MB minimum (typical usage is very low).
*   **Disk Space:** Less than 100 MB for the application and script library.
*   **Dependencies:** No external dependencies required for core functionality; scripts run in an embedded JavaScript environment.

---

## üìà Primary Use Cases

*   **API Development & Debugging:** Inspecting HTTP request/response bodies, decoding authentication tokens (JWT), and formatting JSON/XML payloads.
*   **Data Analysis & Log Inspection:** Quickly parsing, filtering, and transforming log files, CSV data, or other structured text outputs from command-line tools.
*   **Security & Cryptography Tasks:** Generating checksums, encoding/decoding data in various formats, and performing simple cryptographic operations.
*   **General Text Manipulation:** Converting text case, sorting lines, removing duplicates, extracting patterns with regex, and other common text editing tasks.
